channel.title: Home on INSCRIPTION AT SALONAE
channel.description: Recent content in Home on INSCRIPTION AT SALONAE

item.title: First Week
item.description: So my first week of college just wrapped up so I thought I’d share my thoughts about how it went down.

item.title: Books
item.description: CURRENTLY READING: The Last of The Wine - Mary Renault Here are some books I’ve read sorted by the month I finished them SEPTEMBER 2023 Storyland - Amy Jeffs JUNE 2023 The Sailor Who Fell From Grace With The Sea - Yukio Mishima Selected Poems - Langston Hughes Cider With Rosie - Laurie Lee MAY 2023 The Graveyard Book - Neil Gaiman The Unfortunates - B.S. Johnson Classics: a Very Short Introduction - Mary Beard and John Henderson APRIL 2023 Translations - Brian Friel The View from the Cheap Seats - Neil Gaiman Carrie - Stephen King The Sandman: Act II - Neil Gaiman and Dirk Maggs On Writing - Stephen King V for Vendeta - Alan Moore Heaven - Mieko Kawakami MARCH 2023 Babel: An Arcane History - R.

item.title: Plans Before College
item.description: I start college in little under a month so I thought it’d be a good idea to go over what I’m doing to ease myself back into education.

item.title: First Steps With LMMS
item.description: I recently decided to start recording some of the songs I make with my acoustic guitar. The problem is that with my current setup anything I record sounds like shit.

item.title: College
item.description: My college files can be found here.
